registerCommand(String, String, String, String) - Method in class org.fraunhofer.jhmi.user_interface.HomeyDeviceRepresentation
Register a command for later usage.
registerMessage(String, String, String) - Method in class org.fraunhofer.jhmi.user_interface.DeviceRepresentation
Register a new message to be sent over the sendMessage method. registering a message does not send the message.
removeAllDeviceRepresentations() - Method in class org.fraunhofer.jhmi.manager.DeviceRepresentationManager
Removes all DeviceRepresentations that are held by this manager.
removeAllSubscribers() - Method in class org.fraunhofer.jhmi.manager.MqttReceiverManager
Removes all Subscribers that this manager holds.
removeCallback(String) - Method in class org.fraunhofer.jhmi.user_interface.DeviceRepresentation
Permanently removes the callback.
removeDeviceRepresentation(String) - Method in class org.fraunhofer.jhmi.manager.DeviceRepresentationManager
Remove the DeviceRepresentation with the given name.
removeMessage(String) - Method in class org.fraunhofer.jhmi.manager.MqttSenderManager
Removes a saved message.
removeSubscriber(String) - Method in class org.fraunhofer.jhmi.manager.MqttReceiverManager
